summary:
24 years in the Oil and Gas industry working for 2 leaders in their sector: service company with Schlumberger and international Operator company with Shell.
Full exposure to the Exploration & Production cycles with expertise's and mastery spanning from development, production optimization, exploration in mature petroleum provinces as well as  in emerging /Frontier basins around the world. 
Global basins and plays analysis and screening, portfolio ranking against company strategic intent taking into account full opportunity spectrum (Technical, Economical, Commercial, Organizational, Political and Environmental).
Worked in Joint Ventures with National Oil Companies in the Middle East as well as in global headquarters over 4 continents. Held multiple roles from technical expert in various fields of subsurface evaluation to leadership role as team leader.

Skills Highlights
• Strong strategic thinker, aligning company goals with exploration / production strategy and tactic focusing on value generation.
• Ability to work with very large dataset and summarize opportunities set from management considerations
• Track record of basins and play analysis performed over large number of basins and countries.
• New idea, theme and opportunity generator, high creativity coupled with rich experience in many geological provinces.
• Hand on technical mastery in Geology and Geophysics
• Coaching and mentoring
